document_data.name: Adama's Wrath
document_data.mainbody: '''Adama's Wrath''' was the highest peak of the mighty [[Dustwall Mountains]] in the [[Shining South]].
document_data.Description: Though the Dustwall Mountains averaged {{SI|15000|ft}} in height, Adama's Wrath towered over the rest of the range at {{SI|22000|ft}}.
